      • getBlock

        public BlockBase getBlock(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack is)
        Get a BlockBase from the ItemStack, this will return null if no block is found un the registery.
        Parameters:
        is - ItemStack of the BlockBase.
        Returns:
        The BlockBase of that ItemStack if found, null otherwise.

      • getBlock

        public BlockBase getBlock(java.lang.String simpleName)
        Get a block by it's simple name, for example "BlockBreaker" will return the BlockBreaker instance.
        Parameters:
        simpleName - The blocks simple name.
        Returns:
        The BlockBase of that simple name if found, null otherwise.

      • getBlock

        public BlockBase getBlock(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Get a block by a location, this has to be a location of a BlockBase otherwise this will return null!
        Parameters:
        location - Location of the block you are trying to get.
        Returns:
        Returns the BlockBase at the passed location, null otherwise.

      • getItem

        public ItemBase getItem(java.lang.String simpleName)
        Get an item by it's simple name, for example "MasterStar" will return the MasterStar instance.
        Parameters:
        simpleName - Simple name of the item.
        Returns:
        Returns the item of that simple name if found, null otherwise.

      • getItem

        public ItemBase getItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack is)
        Get an item by it's ItemStack, for example giving it the MasterStar ItemStack will return MasterStar. This method is mainly used for getting the item in a users hand.
        Parameters:
        is - ItemStack of the item you want to find.
        Returns:
        Returns the item of the ItemStack if found, null otherwise.

      • getMuiltiBlock

        public MultiBlock getMuiltiBlock(java.lang.String simpleName)
        get a multiblock structure by it's simple name, for example "AdvancedCraftingTable" will return the AdvancedCraftingTable multiblock instance.
        Parameters:
        simpleName - Simple name of the multiblock structure.
        Returns:
        Returns the multiblock structure of that name if found, null otherwise.

      • isValidBlock

        public boolean isValidBlock(java.lang.String simpleName)
        Checks if a simple name is a valid block. This is used to check blocks when loading.
        Parameters:
        simpleName - Simple name of the block you are trying to find.
        Returns:
        If that block exists.

        public boolean itemStackEquals(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack check,
                               org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack compare,
                               boolean checkAmount)
        Check if an ItemStack equals another.
        Parameters:
        check - The ItemStack you wish to check.
        compare - The ItemStack you are comparing to.
        checkAmount - Make sure the checked ItemStack is the same as or greater than the compared ItemStack
        Returns:
        Returns if the ItemStack is equal to the other.

      • itemStackEquals

        public boolean itemStackEquals(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack toCheck,
                               org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack compare,
                               boolean checkAmount,
                               boolean checkLore)
        Check if an ItemStack equals another.
        Parameters:
        toCheck - The ItemStack you wish to check.
        compare - The ItemStack you are comparing to.
        checkAmount - Make sure the checked ItemStack is the same as or greater than the compared ItemStack
        checkLore - Check the lore of the ItemStack and see if it matches the other.
        Returns:
        Returns if the ItemStack is equal to the other.
